hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cloudsource
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Can be something like "develcloud3" (uses Devel:Cloud:*, see TESTHEAD parameter for Staging), "susecloud3" (uses SUSE:*), "GM3" (uses the GM ISO)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud (:1.0)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: number of nodes excl. admin-node minimum 2=controller+compute

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: networkingplugin
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: neutron networking plugin: openvswitch|linuxbridge Default: openvswitch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tempestoptions
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Additional options to pass to the "run_tempest.sh -N " step. Use just "-t" for a full tempest run. Default: -t -s.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: networkingmode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set the networking mode to be used by neutron: vlan|gre. Default: vlan for linuxbridge, gre for openvswitch.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cinder_conf_volume_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set the cinder volume backend type. Possible choices are e.g. "local", "raw", "netapp". Some parameters need extra configuration values which can be set with $cinder_conf_volume_params Default: rbd if ceph is deployed, or raw if there's a disk, local otherwise.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cinder_conf_volume_params
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Set extra parameters for the selected cinder_conf_volume_type . For netapp, the parameters could be:
storage_family 'ontap_7mode' storage_protocol 'iscsi' nfs_shares '' vserver '' netapp_server_hostname '192.168.124.11' netapp_server_port 443 netapp_login 'admin' netapp_password '' netapp_vfiler '' netapp_transport_type 'https' netapp_volume_list ''

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: mkcloudtarget
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set mkcloudtarget to define the mkcloud command line parameters.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# use IBS://Devel:Cloud latest iso image #export cloudsource=develcloud #export cloudsource=susecloud # use latest packages from IBS://Devel:Cloud on top #export TESTHEAD=1 export CVOL=/dev/loop4 losetup /dev/loop4 || losetup /dev/loop4 /abuild/cloud || true #export nodenumber=4 export cephvolumenumber=1 # one disk is either cinder raw, ceph-osd or swift storage export debug=0
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GM and without TESTHEAD # unset TESTHEAD # export cloudsource=GM export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore
[ -e ~/bin/update_automation ] || curl -o ~/bin/update_automation https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/jenkins/update_automation && chmod a+x ~/bin/update_automation # fetch the latest automation updates update_automation mkcloud jenkins-job-trigger allocpool
echo "########################################################################" env echo "########################################################################"
MKCLOUDTARGET=$mkcloudtarget #[ $WITHREBOOT == "true" ] && MKCLOUDTARGET=all [ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && MKCLOUDTARGET='cleanup prepare setupadmin addupdaterepo instcrowbar setupcompute instcompute proposal testsetup'
# also run crowbarbackup and crowbarrestore case $cloudsource in develcloud[34]|susecloud[34]) MKCLOUDTARGET="$MKCLOUDTARGET crowbarbackup crowbarrestore" ;; esac
starttime=`date +%s` perl -e "alarm 4*60*60 ; exec '/root/bin/allocpool bash -x /root/bin/mkcloud $(echo -n $MKCLOUDTARGET) ' " | tee $artifacts_dir/mkcloud_short_stdout.log [ ${PIPESTATUS[0]} = 0 ] || exit 1 # check return code before tee
[ -z "$TESTHEAD" ] && exit 0
case "$cloudsource" in develcloud2.0) project=Devel:Cloud:2.0 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; develcloud3) project=Devel:Cloud:3 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; develcloud4) project=Devel:Cloud:4 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; develcloud5) project=Devel:Cloud:5 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; *) echo "nothing to submit" exit 0 ;; esac
jenkins-job-trigger openstack-submit-project -p project="${project}" subproject="${subproject}" packagefilter="${packagefilter}" starttime="${starttime}"
